actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Adams National Historical Park Act of 1998 to include the Quincy Homestead within the boundary of the Adams National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
short_title: Adams National Historical Park Boundary Addition Act of 2006

summary.text: Adams National Historical Park Boundary Addition Act of 2006 - Amends the Adams National Historical Park Act of 1998 to revise the boundary of Adams National Historical Park to include the Quincy Homestead and carriage shed at 34 Butler Road in Quincy, Massachusetts, within the Park.

titles.title: Adams National Historical Park Boundary Addition Act of 2006
To amend the Adams National Historical Park Act of 1998 to include the Quincy Homestead within the boundary of the Adams National Historical Park, and for other purposes.
